title: Looking for 3 Ranked players (Bronze Elo) | PM me IG
body:
Hello Summoners, My Name is MeIbourne and with My Duo Q, Partner PelvicSorcery, We are currently Bronze 5 - 4, But we work very well together, unfortunately lately we have seen that we are not able to carry 3 others without voice communications, in "those" games, so we have decided to come on the friendly OCE boards in search to find 3 other players for ranked. Thank you and have a wonderful day <3   
- PS - Just remember we are bronze not Challenger xD /  We are just here to help members get out of hell an have a fun time. ( Feel free to check our accounts for mh an all that good stuff,

- Our Goals - 
- To find new friends | - Rank Above (brnz) |  - Work on skill | 

- Must Have -
Friendly | Age - (just able to understand an willing to listen to advice) | **MUST HAVE - Either - Skype, Curse, Discord, Mssnger** | Be available during day |

  | PM me IG for applying an for more info <3

replies.body: You should clarify your name as Meibourne spelt with an i and not an L, people have been adding me lmao
never understood people LOOKING for bronze players lol why not just ask for any players at all?
Cause you get plats who get angry at you expecting others to be as good as them
But I'm bronze in the inside :(
i main top if yall need a top laner
Got placed in B5. Main top and jungle. Can support. Will add you.
hey im always keen to find good people to queue with, add me in game
